summary:
Jakob Smit is an experienced functional manager and gained extensive experience as a functional manager and application manager for major clients in telecommunications, education and industry, such as KPN (ADSL project), KPN Mobile, Metso Paper, Philips, CZ Care, Organon and various construction companies, schools in secondary and higher education and universities. He works at HBO level.
The ambitions of Jakob are aimed at contributing to the good management of the applications.
At the technical level, Jakob has focused on software development and management by using BAAN 3GL and BAAN 4GL.
In addition, he finds it very important to share knowledge. He supports new colleagues in their development within the organizations, he writes course material for new or when there is no material available. He has fulfilled coordinating tasks during projects in connection with plans and he connected employees to their tasks.

Jakob is excellent enployable as senior functional manager. He listens well what the organization wants and knows the right and realistic conclusions based on the available information and translates it into ICT solutions. He motivates others by applying new ideas.
Teamwork and dealing with colleagues are essential within functional management. And contacts with end users are important to him.

education.field_of_study: Teacher Education and Professional Development, Specific Subject Areas

profile_positions.description:
Resource office made it possible to connect employees to new assignments for several customers
Jakob did the analyses for the assignments and set it in a database.
With this database there was control of all possible assignments for all employees and managers
profile_positions.title: Functional administrator and Project Management Officer

profile_positions.description:
KPN used a proprietary system of applications for making products sales for the mobile telephony and the passing thru of the use of funds to customers.
In his role as Functional Administrator, Jakob was responsible for the applications that make the products available.
The main tasks of Jakob were:
•	Determine impacts of the assignments
•	Distribute and coordinate the assignments 
•	Making plans of how the products should be introduced into the systems based on the specifications given.
•	Introduction of products such as devices and accessories, call and data bundles, combinations and actions in the various KPN Mobile Product and Price Management Systems. 
•	Checking the assignments during and after data entry into the systems.
•	He has been a substitute team leader for a 10 week period to replace the absent of the team leader
After imports, the products were sold in stores and via web shops.
The applications were created by KPN in Access Databases. In doing so, Jacob used Query Analyzer to view data in the database or select data for further use.
profile_positions.title: Functional Adminstrator

profile_positions.description:
The administration for KPN of fixed-telephone lines was recorded in BAAN ERP. Hence, all kinds of departments and tasks were controlled through interfaces.
In his role as Application Administrator, Jakob was responsible for the process flow of changes in the products of the customers.
The main tasks of Jakob were:
•	Performing daily monitoring of various interfaces.
•	Detecting inconsistencies and the monitoring. Coordinating with the responsible persons.
•	Creating reports for various KPN departments. 
•	The transition of the administration to an external partner that took over the entire process of administration for KPN ADSL.
•	Supporting and training of the external employees. 
The result was a good processing of the processes so that customers had a good working product that met their expectations.
To achieve this, Jakob made use of the tools within the BAAN software, from Ultra Edit and TOPDESK.
profile_positions.title: Functional Administrator

profile_positions.description:
KPN used a proprietary system of applications for making sales of products for the mobile telephony and the passing thru of the use of funds to customers.
In his role as Functional Administrator, Jakob was responsible for the applications that make the products available.
His main tasks were:
•	Determining impacts of the assignments.
•	Distributing and coordinating the assignments between KPN and Atos India.
•	Making plans of approaches how the products should be introduced into the systems based on the delivered specifications.
•	Introduction of products such as devices and accessories, call and data bundles, combinations and actions in the various KPN Mobile Product and Price Management Systems.
•	Checking the assignments during and after data entry into the systems.
•	Coaching and training of Indian colleagues.
After imports, the products were sold in stores and via webshops.
The applications were created by KPN in Access Databases. In doing so, Jacob used Query Analyzer to view data in the database or select data for further use
profile_positions.title: Functional Administrator

profile_positions.description:
Special Competence was a new department within Atos. The employees of this department had come from the various departments spread across the country.
Jakob was responsible in his role of a Project Management Officer:
•	Creation of an organogram.
•	Involved in making flyers about various products for the department:
The result was a good overview of the knowledge and expertise within the department.
profile_positions.title: Project Management Officer

profile_positions.description:
The secretary is an official member of the Atos Works Council.
In his role as secretary, Jakob has temporarily replaced the appointed secretary.
His main tasks were to keep track of all the work of the Central Works Council's secretariat by means of:
•	Reporting of meetings.
•	Preparing the OR elections.
•	Coordination of agreements.
After this temporary period, he transferred his work back to the official secretary
profile_positions.title: Project Management Officer

profile_positions.description:
The administration for KPN of fixed-telephone lines was recorded in BAAN ERP. Hence, all kinds of departments and tasks were controlled through interfaces.
In his role as Application Administrator, Jakob was responsible for the process flow of changes in the products of the customers.
His main tasks were:
•	The execution of the daily monitoring of several interfaces.
•	The monitoring was split in: 
1. the detection van disruptions 
2. Communication with responsible persons.
•	Creating reports for various KPN departments.  
•	Tracking the management of Streamserve 3.0 and execute the changes for this application. 
The result was a good execution of the processes so that customers had a good working product that met their expectations.
To achieve this, he made use of the tools within the BAAN software, from Ultra Edit and TOPDESK
profile_positions.title: Functional Administrator

profile_positions.description:
In the SANS project for 5 universities regarding the organization of the student administration, the project required a good overview of all project components.
In this project Jakob was in his role of Project Management Officer responsible for tracking budget hours and spent hours and the various costs on project components.
Jakob realized the required overview in Excel using formulas and pivot tables.
profile_positions.title: Project Management Officer

profile_positions.description:
In the Atos Oracle unit, there were several small projects defined for:
-	New employees were to be prepared for their jobs.
-	Support at the conversion of the Knowledge server.
-	Creation of short descriptions for the employees in PowerPoint.
Jakob was in his role as Project Management Officer involved in these project components and the coordination with the management.
The results were:
•	The employees were aware of what was expected of them and where they could find certain things on the internal network.
•	After conversion of the Knowledge database, all things were found in the right place
profile_positions.title: Project Management Officer

profile_positions.description:
Het SANS project was a cooperation between 5 universities. The universities wanted to capture the student administrations in a uniformly interchangeable manner.
The existing data from the universities were transferred to PeopleSoft Campus Solutions.
Within the project team, Jakob has researched how the necessary and present information can be completed within the PeopleSoft Student Administration.
profile_positions.title: Application administrator

profile_positions.description:
CZ, a major health insurance company, had implemented the Peoplesoft application for the management and administration of their staff.
Whit the acquisition of another insurance company it was necessary to expand the structure of the system with a few extra departments, their management, the job codes and the access of  security on this.
Jakob, in his role of Application Administrator, implemented these extensions in the used PeopleSoft Human Resources for CZ with the result that the new department was familiar with its responsible executives in the system. For this purpose, the application was using PeopleSoft version 8.8.
profile_positions.title: Application Administrator

profile_positions.description:
ROC Eindhoven, a school corporation of 23 associated schools for the MBO, there was one central IT-department which provided support in setting up and using Peoplesoft SA.
In this phase, a new version of Peoplesoft SA was realized which required extra effort.
In his role as a functional administrator, Jakob had the task of working within the IT department:
•	Maintaining and keeping up to date the old version and supporting users.
•	Incident management in the 2e line.
•	Providing courses on the use of the Peoplesoft application to users.
The result was a well-functioning and well-organized information system for the 23 affiliated schools, which enabled a good transition to the new version of this application.
He used to use TOPDESK and Peoplesoft.
profile_positions.title: Functional Administrator

profile_positions.description:
Eriks, a technical wholesaler and manufacturer of equipment company, had decided to proceed with their administration from BAAN to SAP.
The project consisted of the conversion of company data about inventory, purchase and sales, financial administration. The data had to be converted from the BAAN system to the SAP system.
Jakob created in his role of developer sub-programs in the BAAN application, which at the time of conversion could be used to collect the data to be converted from the Job Database. The data was then read in the SAP database.
The sub-programs were transferred to the project manager so that, at the time of conversion, they could be executed.
profile_positions.title: Developer

profile_positions.description:
Organon was a pharmaceutical multinational. At their IT department, there was a need for a technical application Administrator, who supervised the adjustments in the Peoplesoft HR application from test environment to acceptance environment and production environment.
Jakob did the tasks application Administrator for:
•	The organization and management for the developed releases. 
•	Transferring adjustments from the Test environment to the Acceptance environment. 
•	After acceptance, transferring adjustments to the Production Environment. 
The result of the various steps was recorded in a document and presented to the project leader.
For the transfer of the adjustments, use was made of the tools available in Peoplesoft.
profile_positions.title: Application Administrator
